import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import table from './images/table.jpg' import { io } from "socket.io-client"; const ENDPOINT = "http://localhost:5501"; const socket = io(ENDPOINT); function TablesList() { const [dishes, setDishes] = useState() useEffect(() => { socket.on('receive-order', (payload) => { setDishes(payload) }) }, []) return (
